entries.headline: Texas claims SEC baseball crown in debut season
entries.summary: The Longhorns rode a dominant rotation and late-inning power to clinch the SEC title in Hoover.

entries.headline: Quinn Ewers outduels Alabama in Tuscaloosa
entries.summary: Texas delivered a defining 34-31 road win behind Ewers' 349-yard masterpiece and a resilient defense.

entries.headline: Vic Schaefer guides Texas women back to Final Four
entries.summary: The Longhorns survived a gauntlet of elite offenses to punch a ticket to Cleveland.

entries.headline: Texas sweeps sprint relays at Texas Relays
entries.summary: The Longhorns controlled every exchange and posted national-leading marks in multiple relays.
